nodes.text: Corellian Seaside was a landscape painting available in the galaxy at some point after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It was created by the Twi'lek artist known as Mi'raj and depicted a sun-lit seaside beach on the planet Corellia. Several trees and bushes were also visible on the beach.

Corellian Seaside is a painting that appears in Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released for the PC in 2003, where it can be used in the player character's home as decoration. The painting was added to the game as part of the "rare loot system" in the Hotfix 17.10 game update on October 7, 2010. The system allows players to receive increasingly rare items as loot from any defeated enemy in the game.
